#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include <cstring>

#define ll long long 
#define in(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define ins(a) scanf("%s", &a)
#define pr(a) printf("%lld\n",a)
#define SIZE 452

using namespace std;
typedef pair<ll, ll>pll;


ll dp[452][452][452];
char x[SIZE], y[SIZE], z[SIZE];


inline ll LCSubsequence(ll n)  //return the length of common subsequence in two strings
{
	for (ll i = 0; i <= n; i++)
	{
		for (ll j = 0; j <= n; j++)
		{
			dp[i][j][0] = dp[i][0][j] = dp[0][i][j] = 0;
		}
	}
	for (ll i = 1; i <= n; i++)
	{
		for (ll j = 1; j <= n; j++)
		{
			for (ll k = 1; k <= n; k++)
			{
				
			    if (x[i - 1] == y[j - 1] && z[k - 1] == y[j - 1])
					dp[i][j][k] = dp[i - 1][j - 1][k - 1] + 1;
			
				else
				{
					dp[i][j][k] = max(dp[i - 1][j][k], max(dp[i][j - 1][k], dp[i][j][k - 1]));
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return dp[n][n][n];
}


int main()
{
	ll t;
	in(t);
	while (t--)
	{
		ins(x);
		ins(y);
		ins(z);
		ll n = strlen(x);
		pr((3 * (n - LCSubsequence(n))));
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
